# Data transformation
```{r} 
library(plyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
data1<-read.delim('Underlying Cause of Death, 1999-2020 (2).txt',header=T)
data2<-read.delim('Underlying Cause of Death, 1999-2020 (3).txt',header=T)
df1<-rbind(data1,data2)
df1 <-na.omit(df1)
df <- df1 %>%
  select(-c("Notes"))
```
